title: Understanding the Matrix
text: The given matrix is an augmented matrix, which represents a system of linear equations. Each row of the matrix corresponds to one equation in the system, with the coefficients of $$x$$, $$y$$, and the constant on the right-hand side.

title: Solving the System
text: In order to solve the system, set the variables in each row equal to the constant on the right-hand side, then solve for the variables.

title: Finding $$z$$
text: Start by solving the third equation $$8z=9$$ for $$z$$.

title: Finding $$y$$
text: Now, substitute the value of $$z$$ into the second equation to solve for $$y$$. What is $$y$$?

title: Finding $$x$$
text: Using the two known values, substitute into any equation to solve for $$x$$.
